headline: Stripe’s Tempo Begins Private Testing with Financial Giants Visa, Deutsche Bank, Standard Chartered
summary: Stripe officially launched Tempo, a payments-focused Layer 1 blockchain designed for high-throughput stablecoin transactions, with major financial institutions including Visa, Deutsche Bank, and Standard Chartered serving as initial design partners. The blockchain enters private testnet following months of stealth development by the $92 billion payments giant.Tempo addresses infrastructure limitations that ...
